title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can generate quizzes from provided materials
description: Generating quizzes from provided materials is one of the most commonly requested features in the education industry, and it is now available in Forms. To save time, users can create quizzes from documents, textbooks, or notes using Copilot. Copilot can create draft quizzes based on the provided materials and users' prompts.
